mapper.insert: insert into user (id, pwd, name, grade, age, sex, email, address, phone, mPhone, status, role, relation, cno) values (#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{grade}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{email}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{mPhone}, #{status}, #{role}, #{relation}, #{cno})
mapper.update: update user set name=#{name}, grade=#{grade}, age=#{age}, sex=#{sex}, email=#{email}, address=#{address}, phone=#{phone}, mPhone=#{mPhone}, status=#{status}, role=#{role}, relation=#{relation}, cno=#{cno} where uno = #{uno}
mapper.select:
select * from user
where role like '학생' OR role like '학부모'
where role like '강사'
order by uno desc, regdate desc
select * from user where cno = #{uno} order by uno desc, regdate desc
select uno, grade, name, sex, mPhone from user where name like concat('%',#{name},'%') and role='학생'
select uno, name, sex, mPhone from user where name like concat('%',#{name},'%') and role='강사'
